meanings.definition: Relating to or located in the armpit.
meanings.sent1: The axillaries glands are found in the armpit area.
meanings.sent2: She applied deodorant to her axillaries region.
meanings.sent3: The ticklish axillaries area made her giggle.

meanings.sent5: The axillaries location is sensitive to touch.

meanings.definition: A muscle or nerve located in the armpit.
meanings.sent1: The axillaries help in arm movement.
meanings.sent2: He felt a twinge in his axillaries after lifting weights.
meanings.sent3: The axillaries twitched involuntarily during the tickle fight.
